channel.title: Weekly News Round Up
channel.description: Wondering what happened this week in news but were too busy to tune in? Desmond’s got you covered with the most important happenings in the world this week.

image.title: Weekly News Round Up
image.description: Wondering what happened this week in news but were too busy to tune in? Desmond’s got you covered with the most important happenings in the world this week.

channel.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com

channel.itunes:summary: Wondering what happened this week in news but were too busy to tune in? Desmond’s got you covered with the most important happenings in the world this week.

item.title: Week Of May 19, 2006
item.description: May 19, 2006. President Bush’s immigration speech, New England flooding, a new CIA director nominee and much more.
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com

item.title: Week Of May 26, 2006
item.description: May 26, 2006. Veterans social security ID compromised, the Senate approves immigration reform, Montenegro declares independence and much more.
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com
item.itunes:subtitle: President Bush’s immigration speech, New England flooding, a new CIA director nominee and much more.
item.itunes:summary: President Bush’s immigration speech, New England flooding, a new CIA director nominee and much more.

item.title: Week Of June 2, 2006
item.description: June 2, 2006. Earthquake rocks Indonesia, Congress is outraged at an FBI investigation, the alleged massacre in Haditha, Iraq and much more.
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Earthquake rocks Indonesia, Congress is outraged at an FBI investigation, the alleged massacre in Haditha, Iraq and much more.
item.itunes:summary: Earthquake rocks Indonesia, Congress is outraged at an FBI investigation, the alleged massacre in Haditha, Iraq and much more.

item.title: Week Of June 9, 2006
item.description: June 9, 2006. Al Qaeda Iraqi leader dead, terror suspects nabbed in Canada, the Senate rejects an anti gay marriage constitutional amendment and much more.
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Al Qaeda Iraqi leader dead, terror suspects nabbed in Canada, the Senate rejects an anti gay marriage constitutional amendment and much more.
item.itunes:summary: Al Qaeda Iraqi leader dead, terror suspects nabbed in Canada, the Senate rejects an anti gay marriage constitutional amendment and much more.

item.title: Week Of June 30th
item.description: June 30th. Israelis in the Gaza strip, sever flooding in New England, Supreme Court rulings and much more.
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Israelis in the Gaza strip, sever flooding in New England, Supreme Court rulings and much more.
item.itunes:summary: Israelis in the Gaza strip, sever flooding in New England, Supreme Court rulings and much more.

item.title: Week Of July 7th 2006
item.description: July 7th 2006. North Korean missile tests, Mexico’s Presidential elections, The Himalayan railroad and much more.
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com

item.title: Week Of July 14th 2006
item.description: July 14, 2006. Violence between Israel, Palestine and Lebanon, India train bombings, Big Dig death and much more.
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Violence between Israel, Palestine and Lebanon, India train bombings, Big Dig death and much more.
item.itunes:summary: Violence between Israel, Palestine and Lebanon, India train bombings, Big Dig death and much more.

item.title: Week of July 21, 2006
item.description: July 21, 2006. Tensions still flaring in the Middle East, President Bush vetoes a bill for more stem cell research, and the Shuttle Discovery returns safely to Earth.
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com

item.title: Week Of August 11, 2006
item.description: Terror plot thwarted, Alaskan oil pipeline shutdown, Lieberman looses and a cease fire is being negotiated between Israel and Lebanon.
item.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Terror plot thwarted, Alaskan oil pipeline shutdown, Lieberman looses and a cease fire is being negotiated between Israel and Lebanon.
item.itunes:summary: Terror plot thwarted, Alaskan oil pipeline shutdown, Lieberman looses and a cease fire is being negotiated between Israel and Lebanon.
